title: Man arrested for burning wife to death in Hyderabad’s Nallakunta; mother manages to save daughter

title: CJI Surya Kant pitches for ‘multi-door courthouse’ for comprehensive dispute resolution

title: Sambhal court directs FIR against 13 cops for fake encounter; police say 'will challenge order'

title: Tripura Assembly Speaker Biswa Bandhu Sen dies at 72
content: Sen was undergoing treatment at the hospital in the southern city after he suffered a massive cerebral stroke

title: Congress pays tribute to former PM Manmohan Singh on death anniversary
content: Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge said late Manmohan Singh reshaped the country’s economic path and expanded opportunities for millions through economic reforms and lifted millions out of poverty

title: Congress Councillor alleges Mayoral post sold for cash in Thrissur

title: Foundation stone laid for museum dedicated to former Karnataka CM N. Dharam Singh
content: KKRDB Chairperson Ajay Singh said that the museum aims to showcase the life, public service and contribution of Dharam Singh, who played a key role in the political and social development of the region

content: The protesters said the BJP is not against curbing hate speech or maintaining communal harmony, but the Bill could be misused to harass social activists and opposition leaders under the pretext of maintaining public order

content: He appeals to the people not to take out vehicles without valid Pollution Under Control Certificates and to avoid unnecessary travel

title: Mirwaiz Umar Farooq drops ‘Hurriyat chairman’ title from X profile
content: For some time now, I was being pressed by the authorities to make changes to my X (formerly Twitter) handle as Hurriyat chairman, Mirwaiz Umar Farooq said

title: Four cops hurt in stone-pelting during anti-encroachment operation outside Jaipur mosque
content: Tensions erupted when police attempted to remove the iron railings as they encroached onto the road. The police had to resort to tear gas shells and use mild force to disperse the crowd, officials said.

title: Anbumani Ramadoss ‘expels’ G.K. Mani from PMK
content: G.K Mani’s expulsion from PMK came a day after S. Ramadoss took a swipe against his son, saying he was not the party

title: Banned Yaba tablets worth ₹40 crore seized in Manipur, one held
content: Yaba tablet, known as "crazy medicine" in Thai, is a highly addictive drug, containing a mixture of methamphetamine and caffeine

title: Marathi cinema will not be crushed, says debut director Kshitij Patwardhan
content: Marathi film-maker’s post wins hearts, as he stands amid the rage for Dhurandhar and fights for slots

title: Grand procession to welcome Valmiki statue in Ballari
content: MLA Nara Bharath Reddy said several senior leaders and legislators of the Valmiki community would take part in the ceremony to unveil the statue

title: Delhi records 'very poor' air quality
content: The overall Air Quality Index (AQI) stood at 310; the air quality is likely be in the 'very poor' category for the next six days

title: The silent scourge strangling childhoods in Andhra Pradesh
content: Nearly 18 years since the Prohibition of Child Marriage Act, 2006 came into force, Andhra Pradesh continues to report a high incidence of the practice. Though the State has joined the Centre’s Bal Vivah-Mukt Bharat campaign, stakeholders engaged in eliminating the social evil highlight how poverty, lack of awareness and limited access to social support compel many families to see early marriage as a coping mechanism, finds P. Sujatha Varma

title: Chitradurga accident: Driver of sleeper bus  dies, increasing toll to seven
content: Mohammed Rafeek, 38, a native of Hulagur village, was driving the sleeper bus, which was hit by a container truck in Chitradurga district; Five passengers and the driver of the truck died at the spot

title: The long road to a water-secure future in Hyderabad
content: Hyderabad is chasing rain, literally. With the Hyderabad Metropolitan Water Supply & Sewerage Board rolling out citywide rainwater harvesting, the goal is to refill aquifers and curb dependence on tankers. But cultural apathy, poor upkeep and fragmented community action threaten to drain these efforts dry, finds B. Pradeep

title: BJP leader urges Uttarakhand Govt to remove video implying his involvement in Ankita Bhandari murder
content: Dushyant Kumar Gautam submitted a list of social media and news channels that he said made "false and malicious" allegations against him

title: Four killed and two injured in road accident in Andhra Pradesh’s Nandyal district
content: Police said four people travelling in the SUV died on the spot, while two others suffered serious injuries and were shifted to the hospital.

title: Five held for trying to sell 7-day-old baby for ₹6 lakh in Thane
content: The gang was paid ₹20,000 via UPI as token money, with the remaining balance of ₹5.8 lakh to be paid in cash, he said

title: 2025 in disasters: How earthquakes, cyclones, floods redefined the year
content: From deadly earthquakes in the Himalayas to catastrophic floods, cyclones, heatwaves and a rare volcanic eruption that disrupted India’s airspace, 2025 was marked by a relentless succession of natural disasters

title: Conventional bridge over Mir Alam Tank sinks hopes of lower footprint of connectivity
content: “The deepest region we encountered is nearly 12 metres and at other places it is nine metres. The pillars will be raised in the lake and there will be a circular junctions at either end allowing traffic to flow smoothly,” informed the official.

title: Twenty-first century solutions to snake bites
content: While a universal antivenom is still not available, it’s becoming more plausible as newer ‘nanobody’ methods show broad-spectrum protection in animal studies

title: Attacks on Christians contradict PM's message of harmony, visit to church: Gehlot
content: Symbolic gestures would not be enough, and strict legal action was required against those spreading hatred, says Congress leader Ashok Gehlot

title: Four arrested for pre-Christmas vandalism in Assam school
content: Miscreants who vandalised the school have been arrested. They entered the premises unlawfully, says a senior police official

title: Tightening the opium belt in Madhya Pradesh
content: The Madhya Pradesh High Court’s remark that a case against an 18-year-old man, arrested for illegal opium possession, was ‘rather suspicious’, led to the suspension of six police personnel. It also brought the focus back on Malwa region’s historic opium cultivation. Mehul Malpani reports on how farmers find themselves caught between drug smuggling and crackdowns by government agencies

title: IIT-Kanpur survey to assess extent of sand mining was illegal: Tamil Nadu government
content: ED had tasked the institute to assess the quantum of sand mined at 28 permitted sites during October-November 2023

title: This winter, Christmas festivities lift spirit of moribund Kashmir tourism
content: According to local hoteliers, occupancy of most hotels jumped from around 20% to around 70% on eve of Christmas

title: Circulatory system diseases remain leading cause of deaths in 2023: Report
content: Annual report on medical certification of cause of deaths showed circulatory system disease was the leading cause of death in medically certified deaths across all age groups starting from 15 years of age

title: Toy industry in Tamil Nadu is now worth around ₹1,000 crore
content: December witnessed two significant developments — one involving Funskool, the Chennai-headquartered toy manufacturer, and the other emerging from the temple town of Madurai. Funskool announced its foray into the electronic toys segment with the launch of a new product range, while Madurai-based Rigwheels, which began operations in 2024, unveiled its debut product — the Vande Bharat toy train

title: AIADMK forms panel to draft manifesto for 2026 Assembly poll
content: AIADMK general secretary Edappadi K. Palaniswami says the committee will tour Tamil Nadu to elicit opinions and views from the general public while drafting the manifesto

title: FSSAI warns food businesses against labeling herbal infusions as ‘tea’
content: Under FSSAI regulations, the term ‘tea’ can be used on packaging and labels only for beverages derived from Camellia sinensis

title: President Murmu releases Constitution of India in Santhali language
content: The President said it is a matter of pride and joy for all the Santhali people, and it will enable them to read and understand the Constitution in their own language

title: Southern districts of Tamil Nadu come alive with Christmas fete
content: Special midnight masses were organised in churches. Coastal villages came alive with festive decorations featuring themed cribs, lights, decorations, musical events, and community celebrations

title: Work on construction of High Court building begins in Amaravati
content: Designed by internationally renowned firm Norman Foster and Partners, the complex coming up in an area of 21 lakh square feet will house 52 court halls, and is targeted to be completed by the end of 2027, says MA&UD Minister Narayana

title: You have been integrated with BJP: Samik tells Suvendu not to dwell on the past
content: During an event organised by the BJP, Suvendu Adhikari took to the stage and said that other from the old and new leaders a section joined the party after being expelled from other parties or getting disillusioned with them

title: Migrant worker killed in Odisha, Trinamool says targeted for speaking in Bengali
content: This is not the first time that attacks and death of migrant workers from West Bengal in BJP-ruled states have evoked strong reactions from the Trinamool Congress leadership

title: Thirupparankundram deepam row: what Sthaneeka Bhattars testified 30 years ago
content: When a row broke out over lighting of Karthigai Deepam at the hill in Madurai, four Sthaneeka Bhattars of the Subramaniaswami  Temple testified that the lamp had been lit at the Uchipillaiyar  Temple since “time immemorial”

title: Amit Shah to inaugurate anti-terror conference on December 26
content: The conference will be attended by senior police officers from the States, and officers from Central agencies and Departments dealing with counter terrorism

title: Carrying the red flag into the next century
content: As the Communist Party of India marks a century of political engagement, its legacy invites reflection on the task to rebuild India on the foundations of equality, secularism, and justice

title: Gujarat Assembly Deputy Speaker Jethabhai Bharwad resigns
content: The BJP MLA was elected as the Deputy Speaker for the first time in September 2021 and was re-elected to the post following the Assembly elections in 2022

title: 915 Maharashtra villages back dignified life for widows
content: For centuries now, the tradition of publicly removing the ornaments considered to be the symbols of marriage for a woman has been prevalent in Maharashtra 915 villages in Nashik district have passed a resolution that they will not follow this evil tradition

title: Aravalli row: Yadav, Ramesh trade charges over mining and forest data
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh claimed that the government is imperilling the Aravallis quoting Forest Survey of India data; Environment Minister Bhupender Yadav countered it claiming that FSI has not surveyed the height of Aravalli hills

title: Railway Ministry notifies fare hike; new ticket prices come into effect on Dec. 26
content: The fare list displayed at stations will also be updated to reflect the new fares effective from December 26

title: Allahabad HC quashes forgery case against shooter Vartika Singh
content: Court finds no evidence of cheating; notes absence of inquiry into origin of alleged forged documents

title: Bus fires kill 64 nationwide since 2021; Karnataka sees three incidents

title: Chandrababu Naidu seeks establishment of Central Agricultural University in Andhra Pradesh
content: In a memorandum to Union Agriculture Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan, the Chief Minister also sought approvals for setting up a Coconut Park, a modern Aqua Laboratory, and a Mango Board to strengthen agricultural value chains and generate employment opportunities in the rural areas

title: Karnataka bus accident: Survivors describe panic, delay in emergency response services after bus caught fire
content: A survivor recounts desperate moments as he escaped out of the burning vehicle: ‘I jumped down, broke the window, and managed to pull another passenger out. Within 40 seconds, everything was burning. Nothing was visible. Thick smoke engulfed the bus, and we could not make out if people were still inside or even where to run.’

title: Neither people of Vizag nor their representatives consulted on Rushikonda buildings, says BJP MLA
content: Objecting to the Cabinet Sub-Committee’s plan to recommend the handing over of the buildings to major hotel groups, Vishnu Kumar Raju says the opinion of the people of Visakhapatnam must be taken into consideration

title: Indian Army allows ‘passive participation’ on social media, revises long-standing ban
content: Revised guidelines permit viewing access on select platforms while retaining strict controls to safeguard operational security

title: People enjoying fruits of reforms initiated by former Prime Minister A.B. Vajpayee, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The reforms have become the central pillar of India’s development, he says, and defends development of medical colleges under PPP model

title: Vikes dominate Lions despite woeful passing game
content: The Vikings accomplished the rare feat of winning an NFL game 23-10 while finishing with fewer than 10 net passing yards.

title: Redick rips into Lakers: 'We don't care enough'
content: Lakers coach JJ Redick lit into his team after a blowout loss to the Rockets, saying it doesn't care enough and that next practice will be "uncomfortable."

title: Kelce emotional after season finale at Arrowhead
content: The Kansas City Chiefs' loss to the Denver Broncos on Thursday might have marked Travis Kelce's final appearance at Arrowhead Stadium, though the star tight end remained noncommittal about his future following the game.

title: Lions' playoff chances end with loss: 'It sucks'
content: The Lions officially fell out of playoff contention with a 23-10 loss to the Vikings, leaving Detroit to evaluate how it needs to improve.

title: Dak's 'pride' has him planning to play final game
content: Dak Prescott reiterated after Thursday's win that he wants to play in next week's season finale versus the Giants, citing his pride in not finishing below .500 as a team.

title: Sources: Soderstrom, A's agree, 7 years, $86M
content: Left fielder Tyler Soderstrom and the A's are in agreement on a seven-year, $86 million contract with a club option for an eighth season and escalators that can max out at $131 million, sources told ESPN.

title: Spurs continue dominance over OKC with 3rd win
content: The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 117-102 on Thursday for their third win over the defending NBA champs in the past two weeks.

content: From signature holes to a bigger and better putting green, the TGL is ready for the start of the 2026 season.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want Gallagher loan, Atlético want €30m
content: Atlético Madrid midfielder Conor Gallagher is the subject of interest from Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: "India Looks Good From All Sides": Shubhanshu Shukla To NDTV
content: Air Force Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla was honoured as the 'Science Icon of the Year' at the NDTV Indian of the Year 2025 awards in Delhi, where he spoke about the mission that took him beyond Earth and what followed after his return.

title: US Tells Afghan Migrants to Report on Christmas, New Years Day
content: US Immigration and Customs Enforcement summoned Afghans residing in the US to present their documents during the holiday season, marking the latest effort by the Trump administration to crack down on migrants from the Asian nation.

title: Hyderabad Man Sets Wife Ablaze In Front Of Children, Pushes Daughter In Fire
content: A woman burnt to death after her husband allegedly set her on fire in front of their children in Hyderabad. He also pushed their daughter into the flames before fleeing.

title: What To Know About Terrorists Targeted By US Airstrikes In Northwest Nigeria
content: Nigeria, which is battling multiple armed groups, said the US strikes were part of an exchange of intelligence and strategic coordination between the two countries.

title: Brazil's Bolsonaro Releases Letter Backing Son for 2026 Presidential Race
content: Brazil's former President Jair Bolsonaro released a handwritten letter on Thursday confirming that he was backing one of his sons for the 2026 presidential race.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Bollywood Is No Match for India's New Wave Cinema
content: The signature motif of Kantara: A Legend Chapter 1, India's second-biggest box-office success of 2025, is a primordial scream. It may as well be the sound of old Bollywood in its death throes or the birth pangs of a new industry.

title: Case Against Saurabh Bhardwaj, Other AAP Leaders For 'Fainting' Santa Video
content: The complaint said that Santa Claus - a revered religious and cultural icon for Christians worldwide - was portrayed in a derogatory and mocking manner.

title: Telangana Teen Dies By Suicide After Losing Rs 1 Lakh In Online Betting
content: An 18-year-old man in Telangana died by suicide after he lost Rs 1 lakh through a betting app. The man, identified as Vikram, was a resident of the Kandukur area in the Sangareddy district.

title: "Hospital Killed Him": Indian Man's Wife In Canada Recalls 8-Hour Ordeal
content: Days after Prashant Sreekumar, a 44-year-old Indian-origin man, died of suspected cardiac arrest while waiting for treatment at Grey Nuns Community Hospital in Canada's Edmonton, a video of his wife has gone viral.

title: Opinion: Opinion | SHANTI Bill Deserves Scrutiny - But Support, Too
content: No law is perfect. Some provisions of the SHANTI Bill will warrant review, oversight, and refinement as implementation unfolds. But rejecting the Bill outright would mean accepting stagnation.

title: H-1B Visa FAQs: All About Team Trump's Wage Policy, How It May Affect Indians
content: In a significant H-1B visa policy overhaul, the Trump administration in the United States is replacing the random lottery system that selected beneficiaries with a process that gives greater weight to those with higher skills and who are better paid.

title: Accountant Carrying Rs 85 Lakh On Scooter Looted On Delhi-Lucknow Highway
content: A ride on a highway turned traumatising for a man after bike-borne robbers snatched away his bag containing Rs 85 lakh in office cash. The incident, which took place on the Delhi-Lucknow highway, was caught on camera.

title: Who Was Shivank Avasthi? 20-Year-Old Indian Student Shot Dead In Canada
content: Shivank Avasthi, a 20-year-old Indian student, was shot dead near the University of Toronto Scarborough campus in Canada.

title: Aligarh Teacher's Killers Kept Shooting Him In The Head Even After He Died
content: Two days after a teacher was shot dead on the Aligarh Muslim University (AMU) campus in Uttar Pradesh, CCTV footage of the incident has surfaced.

title: Consider Law Like Australia To Ban Under-16s From Social Media: Madras High Court
content: Australia this month became the first country in the world to ban social media for children younger than 16.

title: Udaipur IT Firm CEO, Woman Executive Head Arrested For Raping Manager In Car
content: The three accused were detained on Wednesday and produced before a court - where they were remanded to four-day police custody.

title: Opinion: Opinion | SHANTI Bill May Not Necessarily Be A Nuclear 'Sell-Out', After All
content: Whether SHANTI is a sell-out dressed up as reform, or a lever for reliable power for industry and cities, and for turning rural power from a lottery into a utility, will be decided by the hard work of implementation.

title: 10 Bills That Grabbed Eyeballs Around The World In 2025
content: Numerous bills were passed around the world throughout 2025. However, some of them ignited fierce debates, with some citizens and opposition leaders expressing concerns over rights, security, and economics against national priorities.

title: "Don't Trust Agents Claiming Guaranteed US Visa", Warns Embassy In India
content: The US Embassy in India has issued an advisory against fraudulent messages and agents offering guaranteed visas or quick approvals.

title: Video: Drunk Creta Driver Drags Royal Enfield Bike For 500 Metres In Bengaluru On Christmas Eve
content: In a drunken driving incident in Bengaluru, a motorcycle was dragged for half a kilometre by a car following a chain collision on Christmas Eve.

title: Suspicious death of 16-year-old girl turns out to be case of ‘honour killing’
content: e-Paper The View From India Looking at World Affairs from the Indian perspective . first day first show news and reviews from the world of cinema and streaming . the weekly newsletter from science writers takes the jargon out of science and puts the fun in!

title: 'Your mother will die today’: Man sets wife ablaze in front of children; accused her of infidelity
content: A shocking incident unfolded in Hyderabad as a 26-year-old woman was allegedly burnt alive by her husband. The victim, Chityala Triveni, succumbed to her injuries after being doused with petrol and set ablaze by her husband, K Venkatesh, who reportedly accused her of infidelity. The accused has been arrested, and the couple's children provided harrowing accounts to investigators.

title: BJP scripts history in Kerala: VV Rajesh elected Thiruvananthapuram mayor
content: VV Rajesh made history as the first BJP Mayor of Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, winning with 51 votes. He garnered support from 50 BJP councillors and one independent. The UDF candidate received 17 votes, and the LDF candidate secured 29 votes in the election.

title: The Rs 40 shot: Inside cough syrup racket hooking teens across states; 78 arrested in UP
content: A vast illicit economy fueled by codeine-based cough syrups is thriving across East UP and beyond, preying on youth and laborers. Investigations reveal a multi-crore racket involving diversion from legal channels, with kingpins orchestrating a complex smuggling network. Authorities are intensifying crackdowns, with multiple arrests and probes underway.

title: Duck for Rohit, 77 for Kohli: Fans endure a rollercoaster day at Vijay Hazare Trophy
content: Rohit Sharma suffered a golden duck in the Vijay Hazare Trophy against Uttarakhand, while Virat Kohli impressed with a rapid 77 for Delhi against Gujarat. This contrast reflects their recent ODI performances, with Kohli in exceptional form and Rohit also maintaining strong scoring.

title: UP police brutality: Farmer hung upside down, legs broken
content: A farmer in Agra was allegedly subjected to brutal custodial torture, including being hung upside down and severely beaten, resulting in fractured legs. The State Human Rights Commission has registered a case, and a parallel probe is underway. Three police personnel have been suspended, and an ACP removed for negligence.

title: Google CEO shares AI-made Xmas photo: Elon Musk reacts; post goes viral
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai's AI-generated Christmas greeting featuring himself and his dog, Jeffree, in a custom snow globe image, garnered significant attention on X.

title: Govt bans certain substances in incense sticks; flags 'potential impact on health'
content: India has introduced a new quality standard for incense sticks (agarbatti), banning harmful insecticidal chemicals and synthetic fragrance intermediates. Developed by BIS, this aims to ensure safer products, promote sustainability, and boost consumer confidence. The move supports the nation's significant agarbatti industry, a major employer, and enhances its global market access.

title: ‘Fail and you’re fired’:’ Google, Microsoft warn execs sent to South Korea, claims analyst
content: Tech giants Microsoft and Google are reportedly threatening procurement executives with termination over failure to secure critical memory chip supplies from Samsung and SK Hynix. This intense pressure stems from the global memory shortage, driven by AI demand, leading to soaring RAM prices and forcing companies to restructure hiring for Asian supply chains.

title: Watch: Man bursts firecrackers from moving car on Hyderabad expressway
content: A man was filmed launching sky shot firecrackers from a moving car on Hyderabad's PVNR Expressway, sparking safety concerns. Separately, a builder in Surat was arrested for stopping traffic to set off fireworks in celebration of his son's birthday, causing commuter disruption.

title: Ashes: Twenty wickets fall on wild opening day - Boxing Day test explodes into chaos
content: A dramatic opening day at the MCG saw 20 wickets fall as Australia were bowled out for 152, with Josh Tongue taking 5 wickets. England then collapsed to 110 all out, with Mitchell Starc and Michael Neser taking multiple wickets. Australia finished the day on 4/0, holding a slender lead.

title: Ranveer starrer nears Rs. 635 Cr as Kartik's rom-com slumps
content: Aditya Dhar’s 'Dhurandhar' continues its historic box office dominance, crossing Rs. 634.3 crore by Day 22. Despite the Christmas holiday, Kartik Aaryan’s 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri' struggled significantly, earning only Rs. 7.39 crore in two days due to limited screen allocation and the overwhelming popularity of the Ranveer Singh-starrer.

title: AI layoff rethink: Goldman Sachs flags investor fatigue; predicts a shift in 2026
content: Investors are beginning to penalize companies for layoffs, even those framed as AI-driven efficiency. Goldman Sachs analysts report a shift where stock prices decline following such announcements, suggesting skepticism about "AI restructuring" as a cover for declining profitability. Despite this market sentiment, layoffs are still predicted to rise as firms pursue AI for cost reduction.

title: ‘Drew salary while residing abroad’: UK-based Islamic preacher under ED lens; radical ideology charge
content: The Enforcement Directorate has launched a money laundering investigation against Islamic preacher Maulana Shamshul Huda Khan, based on an FIR by the UP Anti-terrorism squad. Khan, now a UK citizen, allegedly drew a government salary from 2013-2017 while living abroad and acquired properties worth over Rs 30 crore.

title: How to link your PAN with Aadhaar before Dec 31, 2025; step-by-step guide
content: PAN-Aadhaar linking deadline nears: Link your PAN with Aadhaar by December 31, 2025, or face consequences. Unlinked PANs become inoperative from January 1, 2026, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher TDS.

title: Who was Shivank Avasthi, Indian-origin student shot dead in Canada?
content: Tragedy struck near the University of Toronto Scarborough campus as 20-year-old Indian-origin PhD student Shivank Avasthi was fatally shot on December 23, 2025. Toronto Police confirmed the incident as a homicide, with investigations ongoing and no motive yet established. The Indian Embassy expressed deep anguish, offering assistance to the bereaved family and highlighting concerns for international student safety.

title: 'Demanded Rs 60 lakh': Man accused in Pocso case dies by suicide; family alleges blackmail
content: A 26-year-old engineer, facing a POCSO case, died by alleged suicide in Gwalior. His family claims he was being blackmailed for Rs 60 lakh to settle the case involving a minor, with Rs 30 lakh already paid. They accuse the complainant's lawyer of threats, stating the immense pressure led to his depression and death.

title: Watch: Builder arrested after stopping traffic to burst firecrackers for son’s birthday
content: A Surat real estate developer was arrested for halting traffic on a busy road to set off firecrackers for his son's birthday. The incident, which caused significant commuter disruption, was captured on video and went viral. The builder was booked under a section of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita for disobeying public officials' orders.

title: Bullion at record highs: Gold tops Rs 1.39 lakh, silver hits Rs 2.32 lakh
content: Precious metals, gold and silver, have reached record highs. Investors are buying bullion due to anticipated US interest rate cuts and increasing global unrest. Silver has seen a significant surge, surpassing the $75 per ounce mark, while gold also touched a historic milestone. Experts predict the rally could continue into early 2026.

title: Techie kills wife: How friend’s 'divorce notice' claim became the trigger; probe reveals new details
content: Police are investigating the murder of a Union Bank assistant manager, Bhuvaneshwari, allegedly by her husband, Balamurugan. He claims a divorce notice enraged him, but police haven't found it. Balamurugan confessed to planning the murder for a year, procuring a pistol, and observing her routine before shooting her. Investigations into the weapon's origin and deleted phone data are ongoing.

title: Dubai new e-scooter safety rules: What riders must know
content: Dubai is embracing e-scooters for greener travel, but new RTA rules aim to boost safety. Riders must follow speed limits, wear helmets, and maintain distance from pedestrians.  Carrying scooters on public transport now has strict guidelines, with penalties for violations. These measures ensure safe micro-mobility for all.

title: Love for German Shephard: Distressed by pet dog’s illness, UP sisters die by suicide; probe under way
content: Two sisters in Lucknow died by suicide after allegedly being distraught over their pet dog's deteriorating health. The women, aged 22 and 24, reportedly consumed poison. Police are investigating the incident, noting the siblings also had mental health issues and were deeply attached to their ailing German Shepherd.

title: Ask Dhirendra: ‘If I know markets go up in long run, why do short-term losses bother me so much?’
content: The test of a good investment is not whether it goes up every quarter; it’s whether it helps you reach your goals over ten or twenty years.

title: Vijay Hazare Trophy: Why Vaibhav Sooryavanshi missed Bihar’s match against Manipur
content: Fourteen-year-old Bihar cricketer Vaibhav Sooryavanshi is being honored with the Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar in New Delhi. This prestigious award recognises his exceptional talent, highlighted by a record-breaking 190 off 84 balls in the Vijay Hazare Trophy. Sooryavanshi's achievement marks a significant milestone early in his promising career.

title: 'Weather will worsen again': Delhi minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa warns of dense fog
content: Delhi's air quality is set to deteriorate as a Western Disturbance approaches, bringing dense fog. Environment Minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa urged residents to remain vigilant, emphasizing collective action despite the lifting of GRAP-4 measures. The city's AQI currently stands at 305, in the 'very poor' category, with several areas experiencing smog.

title: Exclusive! Madhur Bhandarkar says 2025 belongs to 'Dhurandhar’
content: Filmmaker Madhur Bhandarkar shares his top cinematic picks for 2025. Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar' starring Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna leads the list. Bhandarkar praises Dhar's directorial vision and the performances of Singh and Khanna. 'Saiyaara' and 'Kantara: Chapter 1' also feature among his favorites for the year.

title: 'Enjoy what may be your last…': Trump's Christmas message for 'sleazebags' who loved Epstein
content: Donald Trump has fiercely attacked critics calling them "sleazebags" with alleged ties to Jeffrey Epstein, accusing them of hypocrisy for initially praising the convicted sex offender before dropping him. He claims these individuals, largely Democrats, are now blaming him as Epstein-related documents surface. Trump asserts he was the first to distance himself from Epstein, criticising media coverage.

title: 'Santa fainted due to AQI’: FIR filed against AAP leaders; Bharadwaj says 'truth infuriated BJP'
content: An FIR has been registered against AAP leaders Saurabh Bharadwaj, Sanjeev Jha, and Adil Ahmad Khan for allegedly outraging Christian religious feelings. The complaint stems from a video depicting Santa Claus in a derogatory manner, which the party denies, stating it aimed to highlight air pollution. AAP alleges the FIR is politically motivated by the BJP.

title: ‘Pressured her to marry’: Man shoots UP woman in head over one-sided love
content: A 20-year-old woman was fatally shot by a 22-year-old man in Uttar Pradesh's Baghpat district, with police suspecting unrequited love as the motive. The man then died by suicide nearby. The incident occurred after an argument when the woman stepped out of her home.

title: Beckham family feud: Brooklyn Beckham blocked David and Victoria; what his new social media post means
content: Brooklyn Beckham's recent cryptic TikTok, featuring Lady Gaga's "Sorry, I cannot hear you, I’m kinda busy," has fueled speculation about a deepening rift with his family. This follows reports of him blocking David, Victoria, and his siblings on social media. The feud reportedly began around his wedding and has intensified with missed family events and differing values.

title: Watch: Kashmiri shawl seller assaulted in Uttarakhand; forced to chant ‘Bharat Mata Ki Jai'
content: A Kashmiri shawl seller was allegedly assaulted in Kashipur by a group demanding he chant 'Bharat Mata Ki Jai'. The 28-year-old refused, stating he would say 'Hindustan Zindabad'.  The incident, captured on video, has caused fear among Kashmiri traders. Police are urging the victim to file a formal complaint for further action.

title: Gold, silver, platinum hit record highs — what's driving the metal rally?
content: Gold, silver, and platinum have shattered previous records, reaching unprecedented highs. This surge is fueled by strong speculative interest, anticipated US interest rate cuts, and escalating geopolitical tensions. Silver notably surpassed $75 per ounce, with both precious and industrial metals experiencing significant gains amid global economic and political uncertainty.

title: From whispered advice to silverware: Dhoni touch behind Jharkhand's fairytale SMAT triumph
content: MS Dhoni's quiet guidance was instrumental in Jharkhand's maiden Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy triumph. The former India captain stayed in constant touch with players and management, offering advice on coaching appointments and player development. Dhoni's deep knowledge of domestic talent and commitment to Jharkhand cricket laid the foundation for this historic victory.

title: 'Merry Christmas to all': US releases footage of strikes against ISIS in Nigeria — watch
content: The US Department of War released footage of strikes against ISIS terrorists in northeast Nigeria, following President Trump's announcement of "powerful and deadly strikes." These precision attacks, carried out at Trump's direction, targeted militants he accused of "viciously killing, primarily, innocent Christians."

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 above 26,100; BSE Sensex down over 140 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark Indies, opened in red on Friday on lacklustre global and domestic cues. While Nifty50 was just above 26,100, BSE Sensex was down over 140 points.

title: Fire & cold: Karnataka crash survivors recall ordeal as ambulances arrive late
content: Passengers escaped a bus fire near Hiriyur after a collision, facing a long, cold wait for medical aid. Despite quick firefighter response, ambulances were delayed by heavy traffic, leaving injured survivors to rely on locals for initial help and transport to hospitals.

title: Who is Ganesh Uike? Top Maoist from Telangana with Rs 1.1 crore bounty killed in Odisha
content: Maoist commander Ganesh Uike, also known as Paka Hanumanthu and carrying a Rs 1.1 crore bounty, was killed in a security operation in Odisha's Kandhamal district. A central committee member and Odisha in-charge, he was linked to major operations like the 2013 Jhiram Ghati ambush. His death is considered a significant milestone in eliminating Naxalism.

title: 3 years, 3 marriages: Bihar man marries women without divorcing previous wives; arrested
content: A man, Pintu Barnwal, from Gopalganj district, Bihar, was arrested on charges of allegedly marrying three women over a span of three years, without divorcing any of his previous wives. The arrest followed complaints from his first and second wives, who accused him of domestic violence and demanding dowry.

title: Lure of lottery: Hyderabad woman duped of Rs 1.8 cr; fraudsters pose as Ambani, RBI officials
content: An elderly Hyderabad woman lost Rs 1.8 crore to cyber fraudsters over nine months after being promised a Rs 2 crore lottery win. Scammers impersonated Mukesh Ambani and RBI officials, using forged documents and remote phone access to drain her savings from four bank accounts through numerous small transactions.

title: Record! 14-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi scripts history
content: Fourteen-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi made history by smashing 190 off 84 balls for Bihar against Arunachal Pradesh in the Vijay Hazare Trophy. He became the youngest to score a List A hundred and the first men’s cricketer to hit centuries in both List A and T20 cricket before 15. His knock helped Bihar post a record 574.

title: ‘Danger to human life’: Mumbai businessman charged with feeding pigeons in public; fined Rs 5,000
content: A Dadar businessman has been convicted for feeding pigeons in a public place, marking the first such conviction following a Bombay High Court ban. The metropolitan magistrate court found the act posed a public health risk and violated government orders, imposing a fine of Rs 5,000.

title: Nancy Kerrigan net worth: How the skating legend built wealth beyond ice
content: Nancy Kerrigan, a two-time Olympic medalist and former U.S. Champion, is celebrated for her resilience.  Following a shocking attack before the 1994 Olympics, she made a remarkable comeback, winning a silver medal.  Her post-competitive career includes ice shows, TV appearances, and endorsements, contributing to an estimated net worth of $10 million.

title: MLB trade rumors: Yankees tipped to re-sign $80M ex-Cubs star
content: The New York Yankees are prioritizing re-signing Cody Bellinger, viewing him as a crucial long-term outfield piece alongside Aaron Judge and Trent Grisham. After a successful 2025 season, the team believes Bellinger's blend of power, defense, and versatility is irreplaceable.  Despite interest from other clubs, the Yankees are emphasizing continuity and a familiar environment for the 30-year-old free agent.

content: Kentucky dropped out of these Power Rankings back on Dec. 4 . the Wildcats lost by 35 points to Gonzaga in Nashville on tuesday . a complete roster looks very much like a top-25 team, if the second half is any indication .

title: Bundesliga's best so far: Olise, Díaz stand out in Bayern's dominance this season
content: Harry Kane is the fastest player to reach 100 Bundesliga goal contributions . the keeper is the top-ranked player in the world-class category . he wants and deserves another season in the upcoming season . click here for all the latest bayern munich news .

title: MVPs for every bowl game: Micah Alejado helps Hawai'i erase 21-point deficit
content: the 2025 bowl season is in full swing and college football experts are here to highlight the best performances from bowl season . we'll pick MVPs from each of the 36 bowl games from Dec. 13 to Jan. 2 . quarterback micah Alejado proved to be the best quarterback on the field Wednesday .

title: 'If I don’t get this right, my career is over': How Penn State landed on Matt Campbell as its next coach
content: Matt Campbell is new coach for the first time in 58 days as head coach . the 46-year-old had become Iowa State's all-time coaching wins leader . he had spent much of his childhood following Nittany Lions football while visiting grandparents .

title: NBA Christmas Day fashion, led by LeBron James, Luka Doncic
content: this marks the 18th straight season with a five-game slate on christmas day . the festivities tipped off at noon ET when the new york Knicks host the Cleveland Cavaliers . some of the NBA's biggest names stayed in the holiday spirit with their pregame fashion .

content: the Broncos are 20-13 ahead of the Chiefs . the Vikings beat the Lions in the playoffs on christmas day . their hopes of earning the AFC's top seed alive have been reacted to the action .
